name: Saudade III
description:
It's weird how some feelings just don't have a name. The feeling exists and we know we feel it, but there just isn't a word that describes it perfectly. Well, there's one feeling which has a word in Portuguese but doesn't in English. It is "saudade".
I think we've all felt it. it's a mixture of melancholy and absence, but with subtle hope for revival.
Saudade is a word that had to exist here in Brasil, a country that was formed by a people separated from their roots, full of goodbyes and no returns.

What makes you feel Saudade?

Sound and animation by @Tradscape
